content: materials - 1 skein of purl soho s cotton pure 1 100% organically grown cotton each skein is 279 yards/ 100 grams approximately 279 yards required - us 4 3 5 mm straight or circular needles 2 - if using straight needles two us 4 double pointed needles 3 for i-cord samples we knit our samples in the colors heirloom white alabaster cream gray birch lemon mint mineral blue lavender rose moonflower blue waterdrop blue blue gale and ultramarine blue gauge 22 stitches and 40 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions approximately 12 inches wide x 20 inches long originally designed by purl soho designer jake canton 4 click here 5 to see even more of jake s designs 1 https //www purlsoho com/cotton-pure html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html type_filter=888 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/jake-canton-for-purl-soho/ 5 http //www jakecanton com/
